name: Orkney Quest
description:
Long ago, behind a veil of fog, there was Camelot.

This is a short story about four of the five Orkney brothers: Gawain, Agravaine, Gaheris, and Mordred as they go on a quest to stop a villain in his tracks.

This is mostly just a short game I made for fun. It's not very long and as of now, most of the enemy art is stock art. I plan to make an update to change this in the future when I have time.
